scripts.dev-proxy: npm run build && SET NODE_ENV=development && SET DEV_SERVER=1 && vite
scripts.build: npm run clean_build && npm run create_folders && npm run copy_static && npm run create_version && npm run create_prerelease
scripts.clean_build: tsc && npm run delete && vite build
scripts.create_folders: mkdirp docs && mkdirp docs/dev && mkdirp docs/v24_1_0
scripts.copy_static: cpx README.md docs --verbose && cpx versions_prerelease.json docs --verbose && cpx versions.json docs --verbose
scripts.create_pre_dist: npm run prepare_pre_version  && npm run prepare_pre_dist && npm run copy_pre_assets
scripts.prepare_pre_dist: cpx manifest.json docs/dev --verbose && cpx plugin_formit.js docs/dev --verbose
scripts.copy_pre_assets: cpx src/assets/* docs/dev/assets --verbose && cpx build/assets/* docs/dev/assets --verbose && cpx src/Addins/* docs/dev --verbose
scripts.create_dist: npm run prepare_version && npm run prepare_dist && npm run copy_assets
scripts.prepare_dist: cpx manifest.json docs/v24_1_0 --verbose && cpx plugin_formit.js docs/v24_1_0 --verbose
scripts.copy_assets: cpx src/assets/* docs/v24_1_0/assets --verbose && cpx build/assets/* docs/v24_1_0/assets --verbose && cpx src/Addins/* docs/v24_1_0 --verbose
